english.segment1: Well if a DC-10 fell on your head. And you're laying on the ground all messy and dead. Or a mack truck ran over you. Or you suddenly died in your Sunday pew!
english.segment2: Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!
english.segment3: It could happen any day It could happen anywhere. It could happen while you're napping in your easy chair. It could happen at home It could happen at school. It could happen while your rappin like a rappin fool
english.segment4: Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!
english.segment5: Your head is hurting and you take a pill. You truthfully think its Advil. But what you don't know is your girlfriend lied. And she just gave you cyanide!
english.segment6: Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!
english.segment7: You better believe there'll be a price. It was paid in full by Jesus Christ!. (He died for you)
english.segment8: Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!. Do you know where you're gonna go!
